wikipedia_page.main:
Murtaza Ali, better known as Murtz, is a British Asian television and radio presenter.
After a long-running television series Mutz Cutz with the UK's largest Indian Satellite channel Zee TV, Murtz became a recognised personality establishing himself with a massive cult following to thousands of British Asian families across the UK and Europe. As of 2009 he is married to British Asian model and television presenter Gulzaeb Beg Ali.

response: The show currently broadcasts on BBC Two and is co-presented by Adil Ray, Anita Rani and Nihal Arthanyake with additional contributions by Nikki Bedi, Sonia Deol, Bobby Friction, Murtz and a number of other presenters.  Waheed Khan, Irshad Ashraf and Sangeeta Sehdev have all been directors on the show.

response: *Murtz's Request Show every Saturday from 1300-1500 Your Bollywood, Bhangra, Hip Hop and RnB requests with Murtz.
*Sunday Soundtrack consisting of BBC Asian Network filmi top 40 chart with Murtz.
